import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from './../media/logo.bd96ab9e.webp'; export const NavBar = ({ isLoggedIn, username, handleLogout }) => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Logo Section */} Trace Point {/* Hamburger Menu Button for Mobile */} {/* Desktop Navigation Links */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
    • {/* Conditionally Render Links based on login status */} {isLoggedIn ? ( <>
  • Profile
    • {/* Display the username */}
  • Welcome, {username}
    • ) : ( <>
  • Sign In
  • Sign Up
    • )}
); };
